item.title: Combustible rubbish dumped in alleyway behind 16 Kenchester Close, 22nd June
item.description:
Combustible rubbish dumped in alleyway behind 16 Kenchester Close. This rubbish was reported to London Fire Brigade as a Fire Safety risk by concerned resident. London Fire Brigade attended and assured resident that this does not constitute a blocked fire exit but that the rubbish should still be cleared

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartington Road, Vauxhall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bike, 22nd June
item.description:
The moron who abandoned this particular forest bike not only left it on the pavement in an undesignated location. They chose the narrow part of the pavement to ensure that pedestrians had the most difficult time navigating their way around it. This illustrates that the kind of fools that use your service not only do not respect another human being on the planet. They don’t even respect your bikes get rid of the scheme immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Hatfields, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet
